properties.Name: OrderLineHold
properties.Description: A Hold placed on one or more Order Lines.

Columns.Name: OrderId
Columns.Description: The unique number that identifies an Order.

Columns.Name: OrderLineNumber
Columns.Description: The number that identifies the Order Line Item.

Columns.Name: OrderLineHoldPlacedTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the Hold was placed.

Columns.Name: OrderLineHoldReleasedTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the order line hold was released.

Columns.Name: HoldReasonId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Hold Reason.

Columns.Name: HoldTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Hold Type.

Columns.Name: OrderLineHoldNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Order Line Hold.
